weekly picks (Jul 3 week 2023)

Posted on July 10, 2023 in 2023jul,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Jul 3rd week collection

  1. 201aa4435925 quantum computer with phonon (medium)

  2. 2307.05024 Physical origin of color changes in lutetium hydride under pressure (arXiv)

  3. 2307.05009 Enhancement of Superconductivity in the Fibonacci Chain (arXiv)

  4. 2307.05477 Wiedemann-Franz law in graphene in the presence of a weak magnetic field (DasSarma, arXiv)

  5. 2307.05336 Microwave hinge states in a simple-cubic-lattice photonic crystal insulator (arXiv)

  6. PhysRevLett.131.026501 Kondo Lattice Model in Magic-Angle Twisted Bilayer Graphene (graphene, PRL)

  7. PhysRevLett.131.026502 Kondo Lattice Model of Magic-Angle Twisted-Bilayer Graphene: Hund’s Rule, Local-Moment Fluctuations, and Low-Energy Effective Theory (graphene, PRL)

  8. PhysRevLett.131.026601 Emergence of the Chern Supermetal and Pair-Density Wave through Higher-Order Van Hove Singularities in the Haldane-Hubbard Model (PRL)

  9. PhysRevLett.131.026001 Superconductivity beyond the Conventional Pauli Limit in High-Pressure ${\mathrm{CeSb}}_{2}$ (PRL)

  10. PhysRevB.108.014408 Unconventional skyrmions in an interfacial frustrated triangular lattice (skyrmion, PRB)

  11. 2307.03954 Magnon influence on the superconducting DOS in FI/S bilayers (arXiv)

  12. 2307.03931 Robust anomalous Hall effect in ferromagnetic metal under high pressure (arXiv)

  13. 2307.03861 Spectroscopic evidence for topological band structure in FeTe${0.55}$Se${0.45}$ (arXiv)

  14. 2307.03773 The topological Kondo model out of equilibrium (arXiv)

  15. 2307.04750 Quantum oscillations with topological phases in a kagome metal CsTi$_3$Bi$_5$ (BinghaiYan, arXiv)

  16. 2307.04352 Phase Diagram and Crossover Phases of Topologically Ordered Graphene Zigzag Nanoribbons: Role of Localization Effects (arXiv)

  17. 2307.04307 Weyl semimetallic state in the Rashba-Hubbard model (arXiv)

  18. 2307.03793 Weak-Coupling Theory of Neutron Scattering as a Probe of Altermagnetism (Altermagnetism, arXiv)

  19. 2307.03776 Double-$Q$ spin chirality stripes in the anomalous Hall antiferromagnet CoNb$_3$S$_6$ (double-Q, arXiv)

  20. 2307.04176 Electron-phonon driven charge density wave in CuTe (arXiv)

  21. 2307.04174 Strongly interacting 2D electron systems: Evidence for enhanced 1D edge-channel coupling (arXiv)

  22. 2307.04605 Moire-enabled artificial topological superconductivity in twisted bilayer graphene (Lado, arXiv)

  23. 2307.04334 Quasicrystalline second-order topological semimetals (Quasicrystalline, arXiv)

  24. 2307.04170 Correlation-induced symmetry-broken states in large-angle twisted bilayer graphene on MoS2 (graphene, arXiv)

  25. 2307.03876 Revealing intrinsic domains and fluctuations of moire magnetism by a wide-field quantum microscope (moire magnetism, arXiv)

  26. 2307.03866 Ultrathin films of black phosphorus as suitable platforms for unambiguous observation of the orbital Hall effect (phosphorus, arXiv)

  27. 2307.03772 Effects of anisotropy on the high field magnetoresistance of Weyl semimetals (arXiv)

  28. 2307.03314 Photoinduced Anomalous Supercurrent Hall Effect (Supercurrent Hall Effect, arXiv)

  29. 2307.03731 Verification of Onsager reciprocal relation between anomalous transverse coefficients of an anisotropic antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  30. 2307.03658 The PointGroupNRG code for numerical renormalization group calculations with discrete point-group symmetries (python, arXiv)

  31. 2307.03545 Quantum spin liquid in the easy-axis Heisenberg model on frustrated lattices (arXiv)

  32. 2307.03361 Interacting topological magnons in a checkerboard ferromagnet (topological magnons, arXiv)

  33. 2307.03490 Orbitronics: Light-induced Orbit Currents in Terahertz Emission Experiments (arXiv)

  34. 2307.03392 Microscopic analysis of relaxation behavior in nonlinear optical conductivity of graphene (arXiv)

  35. 2307.03367 Valley-Selective Phonon-Magnon Scattering in Magnetoelastic Superlattices (arXiv)

  36. 2307.03541 Observation of the anomalous Hall effect in a layered polar semiconductor (arXiv)

  37. 2307.03414 Magnetically and electrically controllable valley splittings in MXene monolayers (arXiv)
